note.p: Daughter of Charles Richardson Johnson and his wife, Julianna Breedin. Deaf after a childhood illness. Married Henry Edward McCallum in 1874. Mother of Lilian Murray McCallum, born 1875.
BMD (Birth index, Marriage index, Death index)
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1160/73/39)
